title: DOM Basics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of JavaScript DOM manipulation

questions.question: What does document.querySelector("#title") do?
questions.explanation: The # prefix targets an element by ID.

questions.question: What does .innerText control?
choices: The visible text inside an element
questions.explanation: It updates what the user sees.

questions.question: How do you change the color of an element to red?
Which method listens for user interactions like clicks?
questions.explanation: It attaches a function to run when an event occurs.

questions.question: If you want to hide an element using JS, which property works best?
questions.explanation: Hides the element but keeps its space.
